title: Rewrite shell scripts in scripts/ as Python
description:
All shell scripts in scripts/ should be rewritten as Python for consistency. The project convention is to use uv for all Python execution, and Python scripts are easier to test, lint, and extend.

Scripts to rewrite:
- scripts/list-issues.sh
- scripts/claim-issue.sh
- scripts/check-maven-cache.sh
- scripts/conductor-archive.sh
- scripts/import-deck.sh
- scripts/import-metagame.sh
- scripts/worktree-setup.sh

After rewriting, update any references in docs and commands to use `uv run python scripts/...` instead of the .sh versions.
